description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In this revolutionary new video game you take full control of Mr Panda as he negotiates gravity, uneven surfaces and a finite amount of jetpack fuel!  The year is 3016 and Pandas are now the dominant species of planet Earth. Amongst this God-like species exists one Panda in particular, known simply as Mr Panda, who left his home planet in search of adventure.
